Name: NoteFairy
Notes: A set of Rainbow Notes that can be collected in order to activate a switch. It can also spawn a Power Star if Obj_arg7 and the galaxy's Scenario file are configured correctly.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Notes
Obj_arg0.Description: If set to -1, the necessary notes to play the song will be created. If set to -2, notes will be placed on path points only. Any other positive number specifies how many notes should be spawned, however, this number is ignored when Obj_arg4 is not negative.

Obj_arg1.Name: Appearance Speed
Obj_arg1.Description: How fast the creator note moves along the path. Requires Obj_arg3 set to any value between 1 and 6 inclusive. Default is 13.

Obj_arg2.Name: Time Limit
Obj_arg2.Description: How long it takes before the notes disappear again. Default is 20.

Obj_arg3.Name: Appearance Type
Obj_arg3.Description: Specifies how the individual notes appear and whether a short cutscene should be played or not.

Values.Notes: Single note appears, moves along path and creates other notes, starts appearance camera
Single note appears, moves along path and creates other notes, starts appearance camera
Single note moves on path and creates trail of notes, cutscene runs until all notes have appeared
Notes appear one by one, starts appearance camera
Notes appear one by one, no appearance jingle plays

Obj_arg4.Name: Song Type
Obj_arg4.Description: Specifies the song that should be played.

Obj_arg5.Name: Completion SFX Type
Obj_arg5.Description: Can be used to enable the completion jingle.

Obj_arg6.Name: BGM Change Type
Obj_arg6.Description: How the stage's BGM will be changed while the notes are active.

Obj_arg7.Name: Power Star Type
Obj_arg7.Description: Specifies whether a Power Star should be spawned and how it appears.

Values.Notes: Spawn Power Star from object's position
Spawn Power Star from note's position
Spawn Power Star from note's position

Path_arg0.Name: Note Play Length
Path_arg0.Description: Specifies how long each notes play out. Only used when Obj_arg0 is set to -2.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after collecting all notes.

SW_B.Description: If used, all notes will be destroyed once this switch is deactivated.

Rail.Description: The path that the notes will be placed on.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Spawns once all notes have been collected. Requires Obj_arg7 to be configured correctly.

Camera.Description: Used when the notes appear. This is only used by a few appearance types.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.
